title: GrillCheese Font??
content:
A client is asking me to create a logo in the font “GrillCheese” but I haven’t been able to find this anywhere — anyone heard of it or know where I can find it or see it?

Thanks!!!

 [‹ Nested paragraph styles + hard return = tears](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012859/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43832 "Go to previous forum topic") [“Word Art” from scanned text ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012859/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43820 "Go to next forum topic")
author: happycamper
